Reflecting on the Arizona shootings that killed six people and badly wounded Rep. Gabrielle Giffords , Colin Powell said he was dismayed by the harsh tenor of political debate that some have said may have contributed to the attack. There has crept in our society and our public dialogue, a coarseness, a nastiness, an attack of people who don't share the same views as you do, he said. "All sorts of nastiness. "In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana," Mike Pence said in a letter to supporters first reported Thursday by the Indianapolis Star. We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012. Mike Pence has been publicly pondering whether to run for the governor's office or for president for several months. In recent weeks, he has received considerable encouragement for a White House bid. Mike Pence
